page.title: 05Corvedale C.E School History
page.content: Corvedale Church of England Aided school started in the year 1982 the month of March.Four schools came together to make one big school.The schools were Stanton Lacy, Culmington, Diddlebury and Munslow village schools. Stanton Lacy school had only 12 pupils so those 12 pupils and 2 teachers went to Culmington village school.Diddlebury school had to be made bigger to fit in four schools so the children from Diddlebury went to Munslow school. Mr R.P.Bray became the first head teacher of the new school, Miss L. Rawlings the teacher of the middle class and Mrs James the teacher of the first class.Mrs Stephenson taught part-time until 1984, then she became a full-time teacher for the top class.
